title: Second Chance Holiday
description: Mike Rouger isn't looking for love. He decided long ago that he would rather stay single than get mixed up with a woman again. Then Kathleen Mullings comes back into his life with her teenage son and changes everything. What happens when a man set in his ways meets a sassy woman who knows what she wants? Mix in the Mayson clan and the Christmas season and youâ€™re sure to enjoy the ride of Second Chance Holiday.
author: Aurora Rose Reynolds
